The best multiplayer game in the horror genre ....u can play alone and survive on ur own or just make friends and be a team player.the graphics are better now compared to the earlier version.The only flaw of this game is the bugs e.g. disconnection from lobby and game otherwise its 10/10 from me...i fully recommend this game to anyone nomatter which genre u love so buy it without giving a second's thought whether its on sale or not.

- แก้บัคเก่า แต่เพิ่มบัคใหม่

- ระบบการลงโทษห่วยแตก ไม่สนว่าจะผิดจะถูกถ้าตัดสินแล้วคือแบนถาวรทันที
- เล่นอยู่ดีๆ หน้าจอค้าง หลุดออกมาเอง ไม่ได้ชักปลั๊ก โดนแบนไปสิบกว่านาทีแบบงงๆ
- ระบบคัดกรองระดับผู้เล่นหรือแรงค์ห่วยแตก เล่นคิลเลอร์แรงค์ 15 เจอเซอร์แรงค์ 1 3คน แรงค์ 4 1คน
asdfasdf

游戏性还是不错的,玩法也非常吸引人，但是极差的匹配机制和有时容易出毛病的服务器，以及一大堆拔线的，不推荐萌新入坑，会气死你的，作为新号，20级30局匹配了接近 20个五段的r对手，虽然游戏模式非常棒，但是体验感太差，打个比方，开汽车这辆车好看但是啥零件时不时就是坏的


2月10 日正式 弃坑，带一点情绪化的说。好玩的游戏玩法和体制，整个游戏内容好玩。垃圾的匹配机制和防作弊系统和优化和玩家体验和一万个bug，人家育碧玩bug都是文化了，你玩这么多bug是为了玩气嘛，不好好修复专心为了赚钱搞一堆dlc。十个里面九个拔线，屠夫不爽了分不够了就拔线，强迫交易，人被抓了直接拔线。卡技能卡祭品，屠皇跑到20段屠杀新人，人皇跑到中段恶心环境，去你妹的这是steam上第一个差评，不改了！ps.电脑配置和网络带最佳画质看门狗和守望，战地不卡也毫无压力，这破游戏



17/3/18补评：屎一样的匹配和排位机制，屎一样的匹配和排位机制，屎一样的匹配和排位机制重要的事情说三遍。1段配3个20。对面是啥你们知道的，一拖三加死亡恐惧。再多说一遍，屎一样的匹配机制，加上现在多出来的好些透视

Lobbies are very buggy which is frustrating. Game itself is very fun to play, frustrating at times due to the way some mechanics work for both the killer and the survivors. Would certainly recommend it to friends though as its worth the price and even more so when it is on sale.

They've fixed all the bugs that drove me nuts when the game first came out. Great game now

It would be a good game, however as a beginner player(having played 20-50 games so far, and survived twice) they make it extremely difficult by pairing us with experienced killers with rare/very rare perks. I do admit that I would rather have it be a challenge, but the fact that the killer has a 95-98% winrate it just doesn't seem worth trying to grind up the bloodpoints to be anywhere good(My friends and I are between level 10-20) each with out survivors meant to do the specifics that they are meant for such as healing/teamwork/fixing generators.
The other downside would be the Host, As such Dead by daylights creators dont have a dedicated server that we connect to, and rather have the killer host the games which leave a huge impact in terms of delay upon repairing generators to escaping all the way to heal checks.
king of bug game.

To start off, this game has it's pros and its cons.

I would not go off saying that it isn't worth the money, because it is. It just needs a few updates to fix the glitches and bugs it has in it. I'd highly recommend this game to someone who wants to get an adrenaline rush for a little while. If you're willing to be patient, and by pass the bugs and glitches for a while, its worth it!

Have you heard of Raid Shadow Legends?

This game never crashes, never takes long to load, never had a bad team, no glitches. This game is a glitchless,crashless, fun experience. Worth the money completely. Please download. I never get randomly kicked from lobbies or anything. No one ever leaves games. Perfect game. Everyone in this game is so patient no one is self centered. The killer doesn't ever camp you.

Estremamente pieno di bug che a volte determinano il risultato di una partita, i killer sono molto più avvantaggianti rispetto ai sopravvissuti, insomma c'è molto da aggiustare e riequilibrare in questo gioco, spero in futuri aggiornamenti perchè il gioco in se ha un grosso potenziale e andrebbe sfruttato meglio.

Recent updats have been for the best. This is a great game! Killer seems OP at times, but there is a really nice balance of luck and skill here. I wish there were a few more maps, but  otherwise I am hooked. Playing each killer for a while makes one a better survivor. I do not understand all of the criticisms that the community is toxic. I find most people here are pretty good sports for better or for worse. Hours of replayability. I can easily recommend this one to the community.

great game. when you ACTUALLY GET TO PLAY

PLEASE make this game more freindly if your someone who dose not have time and jsut want a quick game i WOULDNT recomend it unless maybe if you have a good computer and wifi that might help

all in all thought the game is really quite fun has a bit of a steep learning curb but once your past it its rather enjoyable

I have over 400 hours of playtime. I do not believe for a second that the game - as it is now - is how the developers envisioned it. Likewise, I don't think they know how to make it what they wanted so they are just running with the toxicity they've entrenched and pretending that everything is fine, fun, and working as intended.
I like this game about horror and plzz to many camper in this game...and fix the shrine 1 day
This game used to be fun

O game é bom sim, mas tem alguns bugs que não atrapalham na diversão (mas devem ser resolvidos). O pior problema com esse game é o mesmo de vários outros games legais... muito cheater/hacker, nego usando speedhack na cara dura, eu de assassino correndo atrás do cara já ferido e ele teleportando pra frente, quando eu chegava perto teleportava pra frente, se não fizerem nada agora pra resolver isso o jogo vai simplesmente ser o que os outros que tiveram o mesmo problema são hoje, ninguém comprando e ninguém jogando.

This game is hella intense but in a good way. It's not the typical "BLARG!! I'M SKURRY POO YO PANTS!" It's the subtle "holy crap balls the bad guy is RIGHT around here somewhere!!!! JEEEEZUUUUUUUSSSSSSS HAAAAAAAALP!!!" There are a few things that I'm not particularly fond of (such as only getting to use items one match and losing it) but I understand that it's good for game balancing so I'm fine with it. Gameplay is smooth and the matches work like they should as far as functionality. The game looks great and the soundtrack gives the perfect amount of ambiance. 

The ONLY real issue I have is with the lobby system. Lobbies as a killer works just fine. But being a survivor, sometimes my game will lock up and I have to task manager and close it. Aside from that one main issue, I really do like this game and recommend you play it. TYPE or PASTE your text here... Click the RED SPELL CHECK button above

It is a pretty fun game, a little scary at first but you get used to it. I recommend using headphones when playing because there a lot of audio cues that can be very helpful once you understand how they work. It can be a little laggy and sometimes has a long wait time to find a room. Overall its a pretty fun game that makes people play mind games on the killer or the other way around. I highly recommend this game.
Not worth the money, the game is so imbalanced and repetitive, you try to run from the killer but he always finds you and you lose in 2 minutes, repeat. Not worth it at all.

ENGLISH:

ENGLISH: The gameplay is exquisite. Each party seems like  different because you never know who will die or what the killer will do. It has bugs, but the game makes up for it. People who criticize so much is because they die very fast or can not kill anyone. If you like cooperatives and horror movies / games, this is your game and if my words do not convince you, my 50 hours in only 4 days will.

SPANISH: 

La jugabilidad es exquisita. Cada partida parece un juego diferente porque nunca sabes quién morirá o qué hará el asesino. Tiene bugs, pero el juego lo compensa. La gente que critica tanto es porque muere muy rápido o no puede matar a nadie. Si te gustan los cooperativos y las películas/juegos de terror, éste es tu juego y si mis palabras no te convencen, mis 50 horas en sólo 4 días lo harán.
Good Game, Fun Times, Topkek memes. Lots of free shit

Das Spiel ist vom Prinzip sehr gut und wen es mal klappt dass die Spieler zusammen kommen dann macht es richtig Spaß.
Leider sind die Ladezeiten extrem lang und die Verbindungsabbrüceh sind wirklich nervig. 
Aktuell gehe ich davon aus dass es nicht an mir hängt wegen 200 MBit und keinen Problemen bei anderen Spielen. 

Es sollte von der Verbindungsstabilität unbedingt nachgebessert werden.
Zero balance... Le jeu était bon avant l'arrivé de michael myers. De plus, plein de bugs et en plus on doit acheter les nouveaux contenus qu'ils sortent. Donc acheter pas!

OMG.... nix für schwache nerven. 
egal ob man der böse killer ist oder einer der überlebenden.... die nerven liegen blank... aber so richtig!!!

pro:
das spiel treibt den schweiß aus allen poren... macht unglaublich viel spaß besonders wenn man mit freunden spielt.

kontra: 
die server sind teilweise überrannt, es laggt, in ein spiel zu kommen kann dauern.

für die zukunft:
ich wünsche mir die möglichkeit, zumindest bei matches mit freunden, private sessions zu hosten, 
die karte zu wählen... dinge die heutzutage eigentlich selbstverständlich sein sollten.

Grundsätzlich eine tolle Spielidee aber ...:

- Sehr oft DC`s von Mitspielern
- Lags wenn der Host eine schlechte Verbindung hat
- Mitspieler disconnecten aus Coop Lobby
- Teilweise extrem lange Ladebildschirme
- Lange suche nach Spielen
- Spiele starten trotz disconnects -> Niederlage -> Verlust von Items, Opfergaben und Siegesserie

Das Spiel an sich ist gut aber...

Es gibt große Probleme mit der Lobby (Spielerstellung) und das vor allem im Koop Modus:
- Sehr oft disconnect von Spieler
- Lags wenn der Host eine schlechte Verbindung hat
- Mitspieler disconnecten aus Koop Lobby
- Teilweise extrem lange Ladebildschirme
- Lange suche nach Spielen
- Spiele starten trotz disconnects -> Niederlage -> Verlust von Items, Opfergaben und Siegesserie


Fazit: Das Spiel ist zum Teil noch im Beta zustand.  Ein Spielstart dauert 5-15 Minuten und dann besteht noch die Chance auf Lags oder Disconnect beim Laden. Da kommt kein Spielspass auf...

Dead by Daylight est un jeu vidéo de type survival horror, multijoueur, développé par Behaviour Interactive. Le but est simple, vous pouvez incarner soit un tueur, soit un survivant; vous devez donc soit tuer, soit vous échapper vivant !

Car rappellez-vous, la mort n'est pas une issue...

Very good and challenging game. 

I was waiting for this kind of game, coop action mixed with Horror. it is well made, no bugs, and really fun to play if u are with friends

such a bad game with so many bugs and the team is not trying to fix them at all. some bugs last for several months

Juego muy adictivo pero con unos bugs impresionantes.
-bug en el menu, no deja seleccionar nada y no queda otra que control+ alt + supr
- bugs con los personajes (se resetean y vuelven a ser lvl0).
-bug cuando por fin, despues de 30 min para encontrar una sala de espera , no inicia la partida y otra vez lo mismo.
En fin, otro juego mas que, en vez de centrarse en mejorar la experiencia de juego y arreglar los 1000 bugs que hay, sacan trecemil dlcs para enrriquecerse.

O jogo é muito bom, mas tem muito muito bug, recentemente eu tive um problema com o jogo eu dediquei quase 200 horas no jogo ja era muito bom todos meus personagens e meu jogo bugou e simplesmente resetou tudo, eles nao me deram nenhum suporte apenas a mesma mensagem toda vez, nao recomendo esse jogo pq voce pode perder tudo que vc se dedicou a conseguir

This game......... 80 % of my gametime I´m just waiting in lobby..black screen..failed to join the game..waiting for 1 more victim..and then booom, I´m in game...wow it looks amazing but hold one, my heartbeat´s getting louder..omg killer, I´m running away from him, I´m running for 1 minute, 5 minutes, 10 minutes and that f*cker is still behind me, I´m running around my teammates on purpose but he´s still chasing me..omg he got me, it hurts, I´m falling to the ground, he´s picking me up over his shoulder, my teammates are trying to stop him.. he doesn´t give a f*ck..he wants me to be dead..he´s hanging me up and waiting till last seconds to see me dying... Game is good BUT joining to game is f*cked up..
Awesome game but needs to be polished.

EU AMO ESSE  JOGO, dez que eu tinha um notebook eu comprei o jogo e comecei a jogar com ele rodando no mínimo, e mesmo assim eu amava, ai teve atualizações que melhoraram a qualidade do jogo, e não pude mais jogar. Daí fiquei um ano sem jogar, me sacrifiquei pra comprar um pc gamer, só pra rodar ele no máximo, e agora to AMANDO JOGAR DE NOVO. Na minha opinião um dos melhores jogos da Steam. 
Ele não é perfeito tem seus problemas, mas os criadores são super enganjados e estão sempre atualizando o jogo, tornando ele melhor, e sempre perguntam aos jogadores o que se deve melhorar. Então compre, por que se vc gosta de jogo dessa categoria, esse vai ser um dos seus jogos favoritos.
